data.title: Famous Czech Film & Theater Personalities
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Czech Film & Theater Personalities!
data.text:
1

Miloš Forman

(Best Known for Directing the 1975 Psychological Comedy Drama Film 'One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest')

16

3

Birthdate: February 18, 1932

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Čáslav, Czechia

Died: April 13, 2018

Miloš Forman was a highly acclaimed Czech-American film director, screenwriter, actor, and professor known for his significant contributions to cinema. Rising to fame in Czechoslovakia before moving to the United States, Forman won numerous prestigious awards including two Academy Awards, a BAFTA Award, and three Golden Globe Awards. His work, particularly during the Czechoslovak New Wave, showcased his talent for biting satire and insightful storytelling. Forman's notable films include "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest," "Amadeus," "Hair," and "The People vs. Larry Flynt," solidifying his status as a revered filmmaker.

2

Karolína Kurková

(Czech Actress and Model Known for Her Work as a Former ‘Victoria's Secret Angel’)

16

3

Birthdate: February 28, 1984

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Děčín, Czech Republic

Karolína Kurková is a Czech-American model and actress, renowned for her work as a former Victoria's Secret Angel and Vogue cover star. Mario Testino has praised her body proportions, face, and energy level, making her a versatile model. Vogue editor Anna Wintour has labeled her as the "next supermodel." In 2007, she was one of the highest-earning models globally, earning an estimated $5 million and ranking 6th in Forbes' annual list of top-earning models.

3

Little Caprice

(Czech Porn Star)

13

2

Birthdate: October 26, 1988

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Brno, Czechoslovakia

Little Caprice, whose real name is Markéta Štroblová, is a prominent Czech pornographic film actress recognized for her exceptional performances. She has achieved significant success in the industry, earning the prestigious AVN Award for Female Foreign Performer of the Year three times in 2020, 2022, and 2023. Known for her talent and dedication, Little Caprice has captivated audiences worldwide with her performances and continues to be a respected figure in the adult entertainment industry.

Recommended Lists:

4

Vera Ralston

(Czech Figure-Skater Who Competed in 1936-Winter-Olympics and Known for Her Role in the Film 'Dakota')

8

1

Birthdate: July 12, 1919

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: February 9, 2003

Vera Ralston was a Czech figure skater turned actress who later became a naturalized American citizen. She had a successful career in Hollywood during the 1940s and 1950s, appearing in numerous films. Ralston showcased her talents on screen, earning a reputation for her versatility and charm. Her performances captivated audiences and solidified her status as a talented actress in the industry. Throughout her professional life, she contributed to the entertainment world with her dedication and skill, leaving a lasting impact on the film industry.

Recommended Lists:

5

Jan Švankmajer

(Former Czech Artist and Filmmaker Famous For His Stop-Motion Animation Work)

9

2

Birthdate: September 4, 1934

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Jan Švankmajer is a Czech film director, animator, writer, playwright, and artist known for his distinctive style that combines collage, ceramics, tactile objects, and assemblages. He is a leading figure in late Czech surrealism, exploring informel in the 1960s, which greatly influenced his animated films. His work is characterized by an unorthodox combination of disparate elements, creating a unique and unmistakable style. Švankmajer's films aim to evoke associations and subvert reality, often collaborating with his wife Eva Švankmajerová on various projects.

6

Vladimir Kulich

(Czech-Canadian Actor Best Known for His Role in the Film 'The 13th Warrior')

9

4

Birthdate: July 14, 1956

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Vladimír Kulich is a Czech-Canadian actor known for his versatile roles in film and television. He has portrayed memorable characters such as Buliwyf in The 13th Warrior, Tiberius in Ironclad, Erik in Vikings, Ulfric Stormcloak in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, and The Beast in Angel. Prior to his acting career, he was a professional ice hockey player in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Kulich has also been involved in charity events, including participating in celebrity charity games with the Los Angeles Kings Alumni Association.

7

George Voskovec

(Czech Actor Best Known for His Role in the Film '12 Angry Men')

7

1

Birthdate: June 19, 1905

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Sázava, Czechia

Died: July 1, 1981

George Voskovec was a Czech-American actor known for his collaboration with Jan Werich. He gained recognition in the U.S. for his role as Juror #11 in the film 12 Angry Men. Throughout his career, Voskovec showcased his talent on stage and screen, captivating audiences with his performances. He was celebrated for his versatility and ability to bring depth to his characters, earning praise for his contributions to the world of acting and theater.

8

Karel Roden

(Czech Actor Known for His Roles in the Films: 'The Bourne Supremacy' and 'Hellboy')

11

2

Birthdate: May 18, 1962

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Ceske Budejovice, Czechia

Karel Roden is a highly acclaimed Czech actor known for his versatile performances in film, television, and voice acting. He gained international recognition for his roles in popular films such as Hellboy and The Bourne Supremacy. Roden has showcased his talent through a wide range of characters, demonstrating his acting prowess and ability to immerse himself into diverse roles. Additionally, his voice work in Grand Theft Auto IV further highlights his skill and versatility as a performer in the entertainment industry.

9

Tatana Kucharova

(The First Contestant from the Czech Republic to win the Miss World Title)

8

1

Birthdate: December 23, 1987

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Trnava, Czechoslovakia

Taťána Kuchařová is a prominent Czech model and beauty queen known for her remarkable achievements in the world of pageantry. She made history by becoming the first woman from the Czech Republic to win the titles of Miss Czech Republic and Miss World in 2006. In addition to her success in pageants, she also showcased her talent on the dance floor by finishing as the runner-up in StarDance, the Czech version of Dancing with the Stars, in 2013.

10

Anny Ondra

(Czech Actress Who Appeared in Czech, Austrian, French, German, and English films.)

6

1

Birthdate: May 15, 1903

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Tarnow, Poland

Died: February 28, 1987

Anny Ondra was a versatile film actress who started her career in 1920, showcasing her talent in Czech, German, Austrian, French, and English films. Her acting skills transcended language barriers, allowing her to captivate audiences across various countries. Known for her adaptability and range, Ondra's performances were well-received in diverse cinematic landscapes. Her dedication to the craft of acting and ability to seamlessly transition between different film industries solidified her reputation as a talented and accomplished actress during her time in the spotlight.

11

Libuše Šafránková

(Actress)

6

1

Birthdate: June 7, 1953

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Brno, Czechoslovakia

Libuše Šafránková was a Czech actress known for her iconic roles in fairy-tale films, including the title role in the classic movie Three Wishes for Cinderella. She also gained recognition for her performance in the Oscar-winning film Kolya, earning her the Czech Lion Award for Best Actress. Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, she portrayed leading characters in numerous fairy-tale productions. In 2008, she was honored with the Hvězda mého srdce award by Czech Television for her contributions to the industry.

12

Alena Šeredová

(Czech Actress and Model)

11

2

Birthdate: March 21, 1978

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Alena Šeredová is a Czech actress, model, and beauty pageant titleholder. She was crowned Miss Czech Republic in 1998 and went on to represent her country at Miss World 1998, achieving a Top 5 placement. Throughout her career, Alena has worked as a successful model, appearing in numerous fashion campaigns and magazines. She has also ventured into acting, showcasing her talent on both the big screen and television. Alena Šeredová has established herself as a notable figure in the entertainment industry with her versatility and charm.

13

Edgar G. Ulmer

(Hollywood Director, Known for His Low-Budget or B-Movies of Horror and Noir Genres)

5

1

Birthdate: September 17, 1904

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Olomouc, Czechia

Died: September 30, 1972

Edgar G. Ulmer was an Austrian-American film director known for his work on Hollywood B movies and low-budget productions. He earned the nickname 'The King of PRC' for his prolific output for Poverty Row studios. Despite working within constraints, Ulmer's stylish and eccentric films gained recognition from auteur theory-espousing critics post-retirement. His notable works include the horror film "The Black Cat" (1934) and the film noir "Detour" (1945), showcasing his talent for creating memorable and influential cinematic experiences.

14

David Nykl

(Best Known for His Role in the SciFi Series 'Stargate Atlantis' and DC Comic Series 'Arrow')

6

2

Birthdate: February 7, 1967

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Czechia

David Nykl is a versatile Czech-Canadian actor with a successful career in film, television, commercials, and theater. He gained recognition for his role as Dr. Radek Zelenka in the SyFy series Stargate Atlantis, showcasing his talent for portraying intelligent and complex characters. Nykl further showcased his acting range by taking on the role of Anatoly Knyazev in the DC Comics series Arrow. With a diverse portfolio of roles across different genres, Nykl has established himself as a respected and accomplished actor in the industry.

15

Jan Triska

(Best Known for His Films 'Lunacy', 'Rád' and 'Up and Down')

6

1

Birthdate: November 4, 1936

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Died: September 25, 2017

Jan Tříska was a prolific Czech actor known for his versatile performances across stage, film, and television. He emigrated to the United States in the 1970s, where he continued to build a successful career before returning to his native country after the Velvet Revolution. Tříska's talent and dedication to his craft earned him critical acclaim, with multiple Czech Lion Award nominations for both leading and supporting roles. His body of work encompassed over 160 roles, showcasing his range and skill as an actor.

16

Hugo Haas

(Czech Actor, Writer, and Director)

4

1

Birthdate: February 19, 1901

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Brno, Moravia, Austria-Hungary

Died: December 1, 1968

Hugo Haas was a versatile Czech expatriate film figure, known for his contributions as an actor, director, and writer. Over his career spanning from 1926 to 1962, he left a lasting impact on the film industry. Haas appeared in over 60 films, showcasing his talent in front of the camera. Additionally, he directed 20 films, demonstrating his skills behind the scenes. His work encompassed a wide range of genres and themes, solidifying his reputation as a multifaceted and accomplished professional in the film world.

17

Lea De Mae

(Czech Pornographic Actress and Adult Model)

6

1

Birthdate: December 26, 1976

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Died: December 9, 2004

Lea De Mae was a Czech high diver who transitioned into the adult model and pornographic actress industry. She appeared in over 80 adult films, first in the United States and later in Europe. Despite facing challenges due to a spinal injury sustained during training for the Olympics, she successfully pursued a career in the adult film industry. Tragically, De Mae was diagnosed with glioblastoma, a form of brain cancer, and passed away at the age of 27.

18

Yana Gupta

(Czech Actress and Model Known For Her Work in Indian Films)

12

2

Birthdate: April 23, 1979

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Brno, Czechia

Yana Gupta is a Czech model and actress known for her work in India. She has established herself as a prominent figure in the Indian entertainment industry through her successful career. With a background in modeling, Yana has appeared in numerous fashion shows and campaigns, showcasing her talent and beauty. She has also ventured into acting, starring in films and television shows, where she has impressed audiences with her performances. Yana's professional journey reflects her dedication and versatility as a model and actress in India.

19

Lída Baarová

(Czech Actress Who was the Mistress of the Nazi Propaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels)

12

3

Birthdate: September 14, 1914

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: October 28, 2000

Lída Baarová was a Czech actress known for her work in film and theater. She began her career in the 1930s and quickly rose to fame for her talent and beauty. Baarová starred in numerous Czech and German films, showcasing her versatility and acting skills. Despite facing challenges during her career due to political controversies, she continued to pursue her passion for acting and left a lasting impact on the entertainment industry with her memorable performances.

20

Tereza Srbova

(Czech Model and Actress)

7

1

Birthdate: June 23, 1983

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Tereza Srbová, a Czech actress, writer, and model, has made a name for herself through her notable performances in various prominent projects. Her talent has been showcased in acclaimed works such as David Cronenberg's "Eastern Promises," Trevor Nunn's "Red Joan," as well as the HBO/Cinemax series "Strike Back" and "Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan." With a diverse range of roles across film and television, Tereza Srbová continues to captivate audiences with her skillful portrayals and versatile acting abilities.

21

Jiří Trnka

(Czech Filmmaker and Puppet-Maker Regarded as 'Walt Disney of Eastern Europe')

4

1

Birthdate: February 24, 1912

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Pilsen, Czechia

Died: December 30, 1969

Jiří Trnka was a renowned Czech puppet-maker, illustrator, animator, and film director. He gained recognition for his work in animation with puppets, starting in 1946. Trnka's films, primarily aimed at adults and often based on literary works, showcased his unique artistic style. Despite notable differences from Disney's works, he earned the moniker "the Walt Disney of Eastern Europe" due to his significant impact in the animation field. Trnka was honored with the prestigious Hans Christian Andersen Medal for illustrators in 1968, acknowledging his substantial contributions to children's literature.

22

Jana Brejchova

(Actress)

4

1

Birthdate: January 20, 1940

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Jana Brejchová is a highly accomplished Czech film actress with a career spanning over six decades. She has showcased her talent in more than 70 films since her debut in 1953, establishing herself as a prominent figure in the Czech film industry. Known for her versatile performances, Brejchová has worked with renowned directors and actors, leaving a lasting impact on audiences worldwide. Her dedication to her craft and ability to bring characters to life on screen have solidified her reputation as a respected and talented actress.

23

Vlastimil Brodsky

(Actor)

3

0

Birthdate: December 15, 1920

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Hrušov, Czechia

Died: April 20, 2002

Vlastimil Brodský was a renowned Czech actor who made significant contributions to Czech cinema. With a career spanning over a hundred films, he left a lasting impact on the postwar cinematic landscape. He is remembered for his versatile performances, including his portrayal of the title character in "Jakob der Lügner" and as Alois Drchlík in "The Visitors." Brodský's talent was recognized with prestigious awards such as the Silver Bear for Best Actor and a Czech Lion for his role in "Autumn Spring."

24

Gustav Machatý

(Director)

2

0

Birthdate: May 9, 1901

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: December 13, 1963

Gustav Machatý was a versatile Czech film director, screenwriter, and actor known for his work in Czechoslovakia, the United States, and Germany. He gained international recognition for directing films such as "Erotikon" and "Ecstasy." Machatý's diverse career spanned different countries and genres, showcasing his talent and creativity in the film industry. His contributions to cinema, both as a director and screenwriter, left a lasting impact on audiences worldwide, solidifying his reputation as a skilled and innovative filmmaker.

25

Štěpán Trochta

(Catholic priest)

1

0

Birthdate: March 26, 1905

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Francova Lhota

Died: April 6, 1974

Štěpán Trochta was a Czech Roman Catholic cardinal and a professed member of the Salesians of Don Bosco. He served as the Bishop of Litoměřice from 1947 until his death. Trochta was known for his staunch defense of ecclesial rights and privileges in Czechoslovakia against the communist regime's attempts to suppress them. He was recognized by Pope Paul VI as a "defender of the faith." Despite facing obstacles in performing his ecclesial duties, he continued to uphold Church rights and beliefs until his death.

26

Jan Rubeš

(Czech-Canadian Actor and Bass Opera Singer)

9

1

Birthdate: June 6, 1920

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Volyně, Czechoslovakia

Died: June 29, 2009

Jan Ladislav Rubeš was a prominent Czech-Canadian bass opera singer and actor known for his exceptional talent and contributions to the world of music and theater. With a career spanning several decades, Rubeš garnered acclaim for his powerful and resonant voice, captivating audiences with his performances on both stage and screen. He established himself as a versatile artist, excelling in a wide range of roles and earning recognition for his artistry and dedication to his craft.

27

Barbora Kodetova

(Czech Actress Best Known for Her Role in the TV Miniseries 'Frank Herbert's Dune')

5

1

Birthdate: September 6, 1970

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Barbora Kodetová is a Czech actress known for her role as Chani in the 2000 television miniseries Frank Herbert's Dune and its 2003 sequel, Frank Herbert's Children of Dune. With a strong background in acting, she has showcased her talent in various productions. Kodetová's performances have garnered international recognition and praise, solidifying her reputation as a skilled and versatile actress. Her dedication to her craft and ability to bring characters to life on screen have contributed to her success in the entertainment industry.

28

Lyda Salmonova

(Actress)

2

0

Birthdate: July 14, 1889

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: November 18, 1968

Lyda Salmonova was a Czech stage and film actress known for her work in German films. She had a successful career appearing in numerous films alongside her husband, actor Paul Wegener. Salmonova's talent and versatility allowed her to portray a wide range of characters on stage and screen, earning her critical acclaim and a dedicated fan base. Her collaborations with Wegener were particularly notable, showcasing their on-screen chemistry and contributing to the success of many of their joint projects.

29

Miroslav Ondricek

(Cinematographer)

3

1

Birthdate: November 4, 1934

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: March 28, 2015

Miroslav Ondříček was a highly acclaimed Czech cinematographer known for his work on over 40 films. His career spanned several decades, during which he collaborated with renowned directors and contributed to the visual storytelling of numerous iconic films. Ondříček's impressive body of work includes cinematography for acclaimed movies such as Amadeus, Ragtime, and If.... His innovative approach to lighting and composition earned him recognition as a master of his craft, leaving a lasting impact on the film industry.

30

Kai Fischer

(Actress)

2

0

Birthdate: March 18, 1934

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Kai Fischer is a renowned German film actress with a prolific career spanning over four decades. She has showcased her talent in over 50 films from 1955 to 1999, leaving a lasting impact on the industry. Fischer's versatile acting skills have been evident in a wide range of roles, establishing her as a respected figure in the world of cinema. Her contributions to the film industry have solidified her legacy as a talented and dedicated actress with a significant body of work.

31

Jeanette Sterke

(Known for Her Films 'Lust for Life', 'Live Now, Pay Later' and 'Moments')

6

2

Birthdate: March 25, 1933

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Jeanette Sterke, a Czech-born English actor, gained popularity on British TV in the 1970s. She achieved fame through series and mini-series like "My Brother Tom" and later appeared in films such as "The Prisoner" and "The Nun's Story." Known for her versatile talent, Sterke also showcased her skills in plays alongside her husband, actor Keith Michell. Throughout her career, she captivated audiences with her performances on screen and stage, solidifying her reputation as a talented and respected figure in the entertainment industry.

32

Václav Marhoul

(Best Known for His War Films Such as 'The Painted Bird' and 'Tobruk')

5

1

Birthdate: January 30, 1960

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Václav Marhoul is a talented Czech film director, screenwriter, and actor. He studied at Prague's FAMU and graduated in 1984. Marhoul made his directorial debut with the film Mazaný Filip in 2003, followed by Tobruk in 2008. His film The Painted Bird, based on Jerzy Kosiński's novel, premiered at the Venice International Film Festival. Marhoul has also acted in various films such as Gympl, Ulovit miliardáře, and Cesta do lesa. He is now preparing for his English-language debut, a biographical film about Joseph McCarthy, featuring a star-studded cast.

33

Nikola Ristanovski

(Actor)

3

0

Birthdate: January 23, 1969

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Ostrava, Czech Republic

Nikola "Kole" Ristanovski is a renowned Macedonian actor with a prolific career spanning over two decades. He has showcased his talent in over twenty films since his debut in 1993, earning critical acclaim for his diverse performances. Ristanovski's versatility and dedication to his craft have established him as a respected figure in the Macedonian film industry. His ability to portray a wide range of characters with depth and authenticity has solidified his reputation as a talented and versatile actor.

34

Jaroslava Schallerová

(Czech Actress Known for Her Debut New Wave Cinema 'Valerie and Her Week of Wonders')

4

1

Birthdate: April 25, 1956

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Jaroslava Schallerová began her acting career at the age of 13 with the film "Valerie and Her Week of Wonders," gaining popularity in the 1970s. She continued to showcase her talents well into the 1990s, starring in notable films such as "Die Elixiere des Teufels" and "Malá mořská víla." Schallerová's performances captivated audiences with her skill and charisma, establishing her as a prominent figure in Czech cinema. Her dedication to the craft of acting and diverse roles contributed to her enduring success in the film industry.

35

Dolly Buster

(Retired Czech-German Porn Star)

7

3

Birthdate: October 23, 1969

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Dolly Buster is a Czech-German professional known for her work as a former pornographic actress, filmmaker, and author. Throughout her career, she gained recognition for her contributions to the adult entertainment industry and her involvement in creating adult films. As a filmmaker, she took on various roles behind the camera, showcasing her talent and creativity in producing adult content. Additionally, her work as an author allowed her to share insights and perspectives on her experiences within the industry, further solidifying her reputation in the entertainment world.

36

Emil František Burian

(Czech Poet, Actor, Playwright, and Composer Who Had a Major Influence on Czech Modern Theatre)

2

0

Birthdate: June 11, 1904

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Pilsen, Czechia

Died: August 9, 1959

Emil František Burian was a multifaceted professional with a diverse range of talents and roles. He excelled as a poet, journalist, singer, actor, musician, composer, dramatic adviser, playwright, and director. A prominent figure in Czechoslovakia, he was known for his active involvement in the Communist Party. His career was marked by a commitment to using his artistic skills to advocate for social and political causes. Burian's work spanned various art forms and he left a lasting impact on Czech culture and society.

37

Karel Dobry

(Known for 'Dune', 'Children of Dune', 'Mission: Impossible' and 'The Girl of Your Dreams')

4

1

Birthdate: May 2, 1969

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Karlovy Vary, Czechia

Karel Dobrý is a highly talented and versatile Czech actor with a successful career in film, television, and stage. He is best known for his notable roles as Liet-Kynes in the Dune 2000 miniseries, Korba in the sequel Children of Dune, and Matthias in Mission: Impossible. Dobry has also showcased his acting prowess in the award-winning film The Girl of Your Dreams by Fernando Trueba. With a strong presence in various mediums, he continues to captivate audiences with his compelling performances and dedication to his craft.

38

Oldřich Kaiser

(Television, film, and stage actor known mostly for his comedic roles)

3

0

Birthdate: May 16, 1955

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Liberec, Czech Republic

Oldřich Kaiser is a renowned Czech actor with a successful career in television, film, and theater. He is best known for his comedic roles, captivating audiences with his versatile performances. With a talent for humor and a strong presence on screen and stage, Kaiser has established himself as a prominent figure in the Czech entertainment industry. His dedication to his craft and ability to bring characters to life have earned him recognition and admiration from both critics and fans alike.

39

Bolek Polívka

(Czech Actor, Mime, Playwright and Screenwriter)

4

1

Birthdate: July 31, 1949

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Vizovice, Czechia

Boleslav Polívka is a versatile Czech artist known for his work in film, theatre, and as a playwright and screenwriter. With a career spanning decades, he has established himself as a prominent figure in the Czech entertainment industry. Polívka has showcased his talent in over 40 films, portraying a wide range of characters with depth and skill. His contributions to the arts have earned him recognition and admiration from audiences and critics alike, solidifying his reputation as a talented and accomplished professional.

40

Carola Braunbock

(Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: January 9, 1924

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Všeruby, Czechoslovakia

Died: July 4, 1978

Carola Braunbock was a renowned East German actress known for her work on stage, television, and film. With a career spanning several decades, she established herself as a versatile performer with a strong presence on screen and on the stage. Braunbock captivated audiences with her captivating performances, showcasing her talent and versatility in a wide range of roles. Her contributions to the entertainment industry left a lasting impact, solidifying her reputation as a celebrated actress in East Germany.

41

Alexander Kerst

(Actor)

1

0

Birthdate: February 23, 1924

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Kralupy nad Vltavou, Czechia

Died: December 9, 2010

Alexander Kerst was a prominent Austrian television actor known for his notable performances on screen. He began his acting career in Czechoslovakia before gaining recognition in the television industry. Kerst's talent and dedication to his craft earned him a strong reputation among audiences and critics alike. Throughout his professional life, he showcased his versatility and skill in portraying a wide range of characters, leaving a lasting impact on the entertainment world. Kerst's contributions to television have solidified his legacy as a respected and talented actor.

42

Fritz Schulz

(Actor)

1

0

Birthdate: April 25, 1896

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Karlovy Vary, Czechia

Died: May 9, 1972

Fritz Schulz was a versatile German and Austrian actor, singer, and director known for his prolific career in both stage and film. With a career spanning over five decades, he appeared in nearly one hundred movies, showcasing his talents on screen. Fleeing the rise of Nazism in Germany, Schulz sought refuge in Vienna before eventually settling in Switzerland, where he focused on his stage career until his passing in 1972. Schultz's legacy as a skilled performer and director continues to be remembered in the entertainment industry.

43

Jan Werich

(Czech Playwright & Actor Who Created Successful Left-Wing Political Satires)

6

1

Birthdate: February 6, 1905

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Smíchov, Prague, Czechia

Died: October 31, 1980

Jan Werich was a prominent Czech actor, playwright, and writer known for his versatile talents and contributions to Czech theatre and literature. He co-founded the renowned theatre group Osvobozené divadlo (Liberated Theater) in Prague, where he performed and wrote numerous successful plays. Werich's work often combined humor, satire, and social commentary, earning him recognition as one of the most influential figures in Czech cultural history. Throughout his career, he left a lasting impact on the Czech theatrical and literary scene.

44

Christine Schorn

(Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: February 1, 1944

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Christine Schorn is a renowned German actress with a prolific career spanning several decades. She has showcased her talent in numerous films and TV shows, establishing herself as a versatile and respected performer. Schorn's notable works include roles in films such as Apprehension (1982), According to the Plan (2007), and Das Leben ist nichts für Feiglinge (2012). With her impressive range and dedication to her craft, she has captivated audiences and garnered acclaim for her contributions to the world of entertainment.

45

George Pravda

(Actor)

3

1

Birthdate: June 19, 1916

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia
